resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

projjal commented on a change in pull request #10464:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10464#discussion_r664828053



##########
File path: cpp/src/gandiva/hash_utils.h
##########
@@ -33,10 +33,14 @@ const char* gdv_hash_using_sha1(int64_t context, const void* message,
                                 size_t message_length, int32_t* out_length);
 
 GANDIVA_EXPORT
-const char* gdv_hash_using_sha(int64_t context, const void* message,
+const char* gdv_hash_using_ssl(int64_t context, const void* message,

Review comment:
       i think better name name it as gdv_hash_using_openssl(..) since ssl is just a library.
   Also rename gdv_hash_using_md5 and gdv_hash_using_sha1 as gdv_md5_hash and gdv_sha1_hash




--

                                 size_t message_length, int32_t* out_length);
 
 GANDIVA_EXPORT

ursabot commented on pull request #10464:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10464#issuecomment-977890435


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 6704cdfd80472a6b1c3b1c0198087fe1582e4287 and contender = 0a85cefa8b9fcd89bbb6c56e884dbdbfeca5452e. 0a85cefa8b9fcd89bbb6c56e884dbdbfeca5452e is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/9293f76d43d34e349f1edcf28a9aea10...cc76a7e8ea45421fb5eecd35493d4602/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/18f861ea334848bcab3f36aeb4c556f6...bc208b2e4d6e497e857e922f44e576af/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/d4457fc18bb74cffa8ec2283be999ec4...32513aa5c0d84324ae71c0d1412b1abb/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True
